son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt

sentences.english: This is electron volts per atom.
sentences.chinese: 這是每個原子所具有的電子伏特。

sentences.english: Forcomparison, the energy of visible light is between 2 and 3 electron volts.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，可見光的能量在2至3電子伏特之間。

sentences.english: It is up around 13, 14, 15 electron volts.
sentences.chinese: 它最高大約爲13，14，15電子伏特。
就是一單位的電子伏特。
